title: User Registration with Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to register using secure multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure my account is protected.
attributes_and_rules: User credentials must be encrypted. Registration requires email verification and OTP.
acceptance_criteria: User can complete registration by verifying email and an OTP sent to their phone.
test_cases: Given I am a new user, When I register with my details, And verify my email and OTP, Then my registration is successful.

title: User Login with Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to log in using secure multi-factor authentication, so that I can securely access my account.
attributes_and_rules: Login requires password and a second factor (OTP/biometrics). Credentials must be encrypted.
acceptance_criteria: User can log in using password and an additional factor like OTP or biometrics.
test_cases: Given I am a registered user, When I log in with my credentials and provide the OTP, Then I am granted access to my account.

title: Password Recovery Workflow
description: As a customer, I want a password recovery option, so that I can regain access to my account if I forget my password.
attributes_and_rules: Recovery requires email verification and secure OTP. Credentials must be encrypted.
acceptance_criteria: User can initiate password recovery, verify their identity, and reset their password.
test_cases: Given I have forgotten my password, When I initiate recovery and verify my identity, Then I can reset my password successfully.

title: User Logout Functionality
description: As a customer, I want to securely log out, so that I can ensure no one else can access my account.
attributes_and_rules: Session should be removed from server upon logout.
acceptance_criteria: User can log out, and their session is terminated on the server.
test_cases: Given I am logged in, When I log out, Then my session is ended and access is terminated.

title: Dashboard Showing Personalized Products and Services
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see products and services relevant to me.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should update based on user profile, account data and eligibility.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard shows personalized product details, offers, and actions.
test_cases: Given I am logged in, When I access my dashboard, Then I see products and services personalized to my profile.

title: Widgets for Quick Access to Services
description: As a customer, I want quick access to frequently used services, so that I can perform tasks efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Widgets should include shortcuts to most-used services and pending tasks.
acceptance_criteria: User has widgets on their dashboard for quick access to services.
test_cases: Given I am on my dashboard, When I look for services, Then I find quick access widgets for my frequently used services.

title: Visual Indicators for Pending Tasks
description: As a customer, I want visual indicators for pending tasks, so that I can track my activities and complete them in time.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should highlight pending tasks for user's attention.
acceptance_criteria: Tasks pending completion are clearly indicated on the dashboard.
test_cases: Given I have pending tasks, When I view my dashboard, Then the pending tasks are prominently displayed.

title: Responsive Design for Multi-Device Compatibility
description: As a customer, I want to access the portal on any device, so that I can manage my banking needs seamlessly.
attributes_and_rules: UI should be responsive and adapt to any screen size, ensuring usability on desktop, tablets, and mobiles.
acceptance_criteria: Portal is consistently usable across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
test_cases: Given I access the portal on different devices, When I navigate around, Then the UI adapts and remains functional and accessible.

title: Reusable UI Components for Consistency
description: As a developer, I want reusable UI components, so that I can maintain consistency and reduce development time.
attributes_and_rules: UI components should be reusable across the portal. Design system should ensure cohesive look and feel.
acceptance_criteria: Reusable components are used consistently across the portal.
test_cases: Given I am developing a feature, When I use the UI components, Then the look and feel remain consistent.

title: Performance Optimization for Mobile
description: As a customer, I want the portal to perform efficiently on mobile, so that I can use it effectively on limited bandwidth.
attributes_and_rules: Optimize front-end performance for mobile devices. Ensure quick load times and responsive interactions.
acceptance_criteria: Portal performs efficiently and is accessible on mobile devices, even with limited bandwidth.
test_cases: Given I access the portal on a mobile device, When I navigate and interact, Then it performs quickly and responds efficiently.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Guided Workflow for New Account Opening
description: As a customer, I want a guided workflow for new account opening, so that I can easily submit my application.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow should guide users through steps, auto-fill data where possible, and allow document uploads.
acceptance_criteria: User can follow the guided workflow to successfully open a new account.
test_cases: Given I want to open a new account, When I follow the guided workflow, Then I can submit my application smoothly.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Workflow for Service Modifications and Additional Services
description: As a customer, I want to request service modifications or additional services, so that I can update my banking preferences.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow should minimize user effort, allow saving incomplete applications, and permit document uploads.
acceptance_criteria: User can request modifications or additional services via the guided workflow.
test_cases: Given I need to modify a service, When I use the workflow, Then I can submit my request and upload required documents.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Input Validation and Incomplete Application Saving
description: As a customer, I want my inputs validated and the ability to save incomplete applications, so that I can ensure accuracy and convenience.
attributes_and_rules: Validate user inputs and allow saving of incomplete applications for later completion.
acceptance_criteria: Inputs are validated, and users can save incomplete applications.
test_cases: Given I start a new application, When I provide inputs, Then my inputs are validated and I can save the application midway.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking for Requests
description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I can stay informed about their progress.
attributes_and_rules: Provide real-time updates and status tracking for all user requests.
acceptance_criteria: Users can see real-time status updates for their submitted requests.
test_cases: Given I have submitted a request, When I check the status, Then I see real-time updates about its progress.

title: Email Notifications for Request Updates
description: As a customer, I want to receive email notifications for request updates, so that I am aware of any changes or required actions.
attributes_and_rules: Send email notifications for request status changes and actions required.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive email notifications for any updates or required actions on their requests.
test_cases: Given I have a pending request, When its status changes, Then I receive an email notification about the update.

title: On-Portal Alerts for Request Updates
description: As a customer, I want to see alerts on the portal for request updates, so that I can quickly respond to any required actions.
attributes_and_rules: Display on-portal alerts for request updates and actions needed from the user.
acceptance_criteria: Users see on-portal alerts for any updates or actions required on their requests.
test_cases: Given I have a pending request, When its status changes, Then I see an alert on the portal notifying me of the update.
